name: Guardian of the Fleece
printed_effect:
This Guardian of the Fleece can only be Cast
when an opponent activates a card effect that
targets an Artifact or Empowered Elestral on
your field. Negate that effect, then destroy
a card on that opponent's field.
effect: This Guardian of the Fleece can only be played when an opponent activates a card effect that targets an Artifact or Empowered Elestral on your field. Negate that effect, then destroy a card on that opponent's field.
